articles.title: Fossil fuel company net zero plans 'largely meaningless,' report says - Reuters
articles.description: The number of fossil fuel companies setting net-zero emissions targets has risen sharply over the past year, but most fail to address key concerns, making them "largely meaningless", a report showed on Monday.
articles.content: LONDON, June 11 (Reuters) - The number of fossil fuel companies setting net-zero emissions targets has risen sharply over the past year, but most fail to address key concerns, making them "largely me… [+1902 chars]
